org.pac4j.core.client

Class DirectClientV2<C extends Credentials,U extends CommonProfile>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pac4j.core.util.InitializableWebObject
      • org.pac4j.core.client.BaseClient<C,U>
        • org.pac4j.core.client.DirectClient<C,U>
          • org.pac4j.core.client.DirectClientV2<C,U>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Client<C,U>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractCasRestClient, CookieClient, DirectBasicAuthClient, DirectCasClient, DirectCasProxyClient, DirectDigestAuthClient, DirectFormClient, HeaderClient, IpClient, ParameterClient

    public abstract class DirectClientV2<C extends Credentials,U extends CommonProfile>
extends DirectClient<C,U>
    New direct client type using the CredentialsExtractor, Authenticator and ProfileCreator concepts.
    Since:
    1.9.0
    Author:
    Jerome Leleu
